meanings.definition: A person who succeeds in achieving a goal or ambition.
meanings.sent1: The succeeders in the race crossed the finish line with big smiles.
meanings.sent2: Successful succeeders often inspire others to reach for their dreams.
meanings.sent3: The group of succeeders celebrated their victory with a joyful dance.
meanings.sent4: Like shining stars in the sky, the succeeders stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The image of the succeeders lifting the trophy will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Those who come after or follow in a particular role or position.
meanings.sent1: The new team of succeeders brought fresh ideas to the project.
meanings.sent2: Future succeeders will build upon the foundation laid by their predecessors.
meanings.sent3: The young succeeders eagerly awaited their turn to lead the group.
meanings.sent4: Just like flowers blooming in spring, the succeeders brought new life to the team.
meanings.sent5: The line of succeeders waiting for their chance stretched around the corner.
